name: Shuffolks!
description:
Suffolks is a challenging puzzle platformer where you can shuffle your folks around and create new shapes to reach heights you could not reach before. Each world features new mechanics and hard puzzles.

  • Keyboard and mouse.
  • 20~30 minutes to complete. 1~2 hours to master.
  • Reach the flag for some C O N F E T T I!
  • Made in 48h for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

Controls

  • Move - 'WASD' keys or arrow keys
  • Jump - Space bar, 'W' key, or up key
  • Attach - Left click
  • Shuffle - Hold shift and left click to drag
  • Unlock all levels - 'Y' key in the level select

Credits

  • kcaze for making the game.
  • shake onigiri for music and sound effects.
  • Jelly no Puzzle and Snakebird for inspiration.
  • You for playing ❤️.
